official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to comparability adjustments under the provisions relating to grade and pay retention for Federal employees.

summary.text: Revises the method of adjusting the pay of Federal employees who were subject to reduction-in-force procedures after the retained-pay status of such employees has expired.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to comparability adjustments under the provisions relating to grade and pay retention for Federal employees.
